pathAssistantSteps.info: A Lead that has been assigned to you will appear here. When you are ready to make contact, move to the ‘Engaging’ stage.

As you engage, enter further details about the client, the company they represent and a brief description of their interest in the QUTeX product or service. Ensure that you complete all fields and validate the company information, the contact details and address. 

When ready to progress the opportunity, ‘Convert’ this lead. Move this lead to the ‘Nurturing’ stage if the client is not ready to proceed.

A lead is a prospective client that does not have an existing QUT account and may be interested in a QUTeX product or service. Enter initial details about the client to enable you to make further contact. Move this record to the ‘Engaging’ stage when you start interacting with the client.
The ‘Nurturing’ stage indicates that the client is not ready to move forward. Continue to build a relationship and when they’re ready to proceed with an opportunity, ‘Convert’ this lead.
Congratulations! Now it’s time to convert the lead record to an opportunity. Then, continue the qualification process with your new contact.
